timeline.message: Correct few things for RDR Flow

timeline.bodyText: Side note: this kind of issue would have been easily caught by a unit test. Be sure to follow-up soon on developing unit tests, which was a condition of approval for #2948. (It might help to track a separate Jira ticket for tests follow-up, so we can include it in sprint pointing). I would recommend including this service as being in scope for unit test coverage.
timeline.author: gjuggler
